audioText: Je reçois des nouvelles fidèles de ma famille.
question: Je reçois des nouvelles fidèles de ma famille.
options: I receive faithful news from my family
I send important messages to my relatives
I ignore constant calls from my parents
I write regular letters to my siblings
explanation: The text states 'Je reçois des nouvelles fidèles de ma famille' - I receive faithful news from my family. 'Reçois' is the 1st person singular form of 'recevoir' (to receive), 'nouvelles' means news, and 'fidèles' means faithful/reliable.
